channel.title: Mapdata
channel.description:
Well, here's my problem. I want to make mostly new landscapes....So I need a completely flat area to...Play with? Well...The only area completely flat I found was the maze random event. So I tried to copy and paste it over varrock, but it's apparently too small and leaves gaps...
So, here's my question. Is there any way to create completely new mapdata to then edit with Tom's cache suit or peter's map editor? I know I've seen people do it...So...How...?

item.title: Mapdata
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“ry60003333, post:2, topic:293954”]You can create new maps. However the map data is really just XTEA keys used to decrypt the landscape files.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,384122.msg2896545.html[/quote]

Hmmm. Interesting.

Though, my smallish brain is having a little trouble finding out how to ‘create’ new maps. x]

Read full topic

@ry60003333 wrote:

You can create new maps. However the map data is really just XTEA keys used to decrypt the landscape files.
